LanguageData.Battlecruiser_ShowControlMenu_Desc: Open the Control Menu, which is used to control the Battlecruiser bound to the Control Menu without selecting the Battlecruiser
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_Select_Description: Select the Battlecruiser bound to the current Control Menu
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_Move_Desc: Control the target position of the Battlecruiser
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_Return_Desc: Control the Battlecruiser to return to Starport. If the Ending Module is turned on, a clearance explosion will be carried out while returning
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_YaMaTo_Desc: The Yamato Beacon is generated to control the Battlecruiser to store the energy of the Yamato Cannon. When the Battlecruiser is facing the Yamato Beacon, the Yamato Cannon is storing, and the Yamato Cannon is fired after 2s
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_Hover_Description:
Control whether the Battlecruiser is hovering
On: Hovering Off: stay in place without hovering
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_TargetMode_Description:
Control the attack target of the Battlecruiser
Non Player: attack all creatures except players Only Hostile: only attack faction creatures that are hostile to the player
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_AttackDown_Description:
Control whether the Battlecruiser attacks the fallen target
On: attack the fallen target Off: Do not attack the fallen target
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_EndingModuleMode_Descripti:
Control whether the Ending Module of the Battlecruiser is activated
On: open the EndingModule and cause an additional clearance explosion when returning (the effect is equivalent to the mixed explosion of materials when being destroyed) Off: Close the clearance module (please close it when crossing the map, if you don't want to waste additional resources)
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_GunWeaponControl_Descripti: Control the opening or closing of the machine-gun weapons of the Battlecruiser
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_RocketWeaponControl_Descri: Control the active launch of rocket by Battlecruiser (number of rocket launched at a time = number of weapons)
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_LaserWeaponControl_Descrip: Control the opening or closing of the laser weapons of the Battlecruiser
LanguageData.Battlecruiser_LaserBuilding_Description: Control whether the laser weapons of the Battlecruiser attack the building
LanguageData.Starport_Launch_Desc: Dispatch the Battlecruiser to the target position
LanguageData.Starport_CrossMap_Desc: Dispatch the Battlecruiser to the target location (the target location cannot be empty)
LanguageData.Starport_Hover_Desc:
Control in advance whether the Battlecruiser is hovering
On: Hovering Off: stay in place without hovering
LanguageData.Starport_TargetMode_Desc:
Control the attack target of the Battlecruiser in advance
Non Player: attack all creatures except players Only Hostile: only attack faction creatures that are hostile to the player
LanguageData.Starport_AttackDown_Desc:
Control in advance whether the Battlecruiser attacks the fallen target
On: attack the fallen target Off: Do not attack the fallen target
LanguageData.Starport_EndingModule_Desc:
Control in advance whether the Ending Module of the Battlecruiser is activated
On: open the EndingModule and cause an additional clearance explosion when returning (the effect is equivalent to the mixed explosion of materials when being destroyed) Off: Close the clearance module (please close it when crossing the map, if you don't want to waste additional resources)
LanguageData.Starport_GunWeaponControl_Description: Control the opening or closing of the machine-gun weapons of the Battlecruiser in advance
LanguageData.Starport_RocketWeaponControl_Description: Control the active launch of rocket by Starport (number of rocket launched at a time = number of weapons)
LanguageData.Starport_LaserWeaponControl_Description: Control the opening or closing of the laser weapons of the Battlecruiser in advance
LanguageData.Starport_LaserBuilding_Description: Control in advance whether the laser weapons of the Battlecruiser attack the building
